Package oop.quizzler.model

Class Question

java.lang.Object
oop.quizzler.model.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MCQuestion, SCQuestion, TFQuestion
public abstract class Question extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents a question. (abstract)

  • Method Details

      public ArrayList<String> getCorrectAnswer()

    • checkAnswer

      public abstract boolean checkAnswer(ArrayList<String> givenAnswers)
      abstract method to check if the given answers are correct. (implemented in the extending classes)
      Parameters:
      givenAnswers - answers given by the user
      Returns:
      returns true if the given answers are correct, false if not
